formalpara.title: Figure 1. Phylogenetic tree of nematodes
formalpara.para: Based on 18s RNA gene sequences, five different clades (I-V) have been defined. Branches that could not be assigned to one of these clades are grouped collectively and named here "PCM group" (for Plectida, Chromadorida, Monhysterida; Schierenberg and Lahl, 2004). With Nematoda as a phylum, four classes are defined by combining suggestions by Malakhov (1994) and De Ley and Blaxter (2002) because such a subdivision fits best our embryological data. Each genus mentioned in this chapter is indicated. Adapted from Blaxter et al. (1998).
